incidents.name: GoTo Meeting, GoTo Webinar, GoTo Training - Audio Issues in V10 based sessions

incident_updates.body:
We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

Our engineers have corrected the issue and we are confirming that all services are functional.

We will provide another update shortly.

Our engineers are working to resolve the issue and will provide another update shortly.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToWebinar - Users unable to start or join webinars

incident_updates.body:
On 08/11/2022, from 10:43 AM until 11:32 AM UTC, a subset of GoToWebinar users may have experienced issues when trying to start or join webinars. Additionally, users would have experienced issues when trying to view their Upcoming and Past events and issues with opening registration and recording links.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incident_updates.body:
On 08/08/2022, from 04:40 AM until 04:57 AM UTC, a subset of GoToMeeting and OpenVoice customers may have experienced intermittent issues with audio and when trying to join a meeting.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimise future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToWebinar, and GoToTraining - Users unable to view  dashboards or start new sessions

incident_updates.body:

Additionally, GoToTraining users may have been unable to view their upcoming or scheduled training. In-flight sessions were not affected.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimise future recurrence.

Our engineers have corrected the issue and are working towards making the reports available for the affected users.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToMeeting, GoToWebinar, GoToTraining and OpenVoice - Unable to start or join sessions intermittently

incident_updates.body:
On 10/23/2021, from 06:21 AM UTC until 06:39 AM UTC, few GoToMeeting, GoToWebinar, GoToTraining and OpenVoice users would have experienced issues intermittently when trying to join or start new sessions. In-flight sessions were working as expected.

Our engineers have corrected the issue and we confirm that all services are functional.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToMeeting, GoToWebinar - Payment integration issue.

incident_updates.body:
Starting from 07/28/2021 18:35 UTC until 07/28/2021 20:05 UTC - GoToMeeting and GoToWebinar users were not able to update or add new payments methods. Attendees attempting to process payments for sessions and organizers attempting to update or add sessions payments received an error.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely by our third-party vendor and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

Our engineers have implemented an alternate fix and we are confirming that all services are functional.

This issue has been identified to have been caused due to a third-party dependency and we are working on alternate solutions.

We are actively investigating reports that some customers may be experiencing issues when trying to access GoToMeeting.

Our engineers are working to resolve the issue and will provide another update shortly.

incidents.name: GoToTraining - payment integration issue.

incident_updates.body:
Starting from 05/10/2021 04:53 UTC until 05/11/2021 22:56 UTC - GoToTraining users were not able to use the RevStream PayPal integration. Attendees attempting to process payments for sessions and organizers attempting to update or add RevStream to training sessions received an error. 

Our engineers have corrected the issue and we confirm that all services are functional.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.
